metadata.title: Skywards Signature Credit Card | Skywards Miles | Emirates NBD

content:
Know more
U by Emaar Family Credit Card
A Credit Card that rewards you with enriching experiences everyday
Know more
Now your spends are your ticket to more travels
Maximum eligible spends
In a given statement cycle, Miles can be earned for eligible spends up to the credit limit, or  100,000 for Skywards Infinite Card /  50,000 for Skywards Signature Card, whichever is lower. Miles will be awarded for eligible transactions in chronological order up to the credit limit or above stated cap, whichever is lower.
Retail spends
Grocery and supermarkets, fast food restaurants, insurance, car dealership earn 25% of domestic spends*
Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education & telecommunications payments earn 10% of the domestic spends*
Duty free, online food delivery and car booking apps

metadata.title: Skywards Signature Credit Card | Skywards Miles | Emirates NBD

content:
Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education & telecommunications payments earn 10% of the domestic spends*
Duty free, online food delivery and car booking apps
Domestic and international Duty free spends, domestic online food delivery and car booking apps spends earn 2 Miles per USD equivalent; spend on Skywards Infinite Card. 1.5 Miles per USD equivalent spend on Skywards Signature Card
International spends
Spends made abroad on groceries and supermarkets, insurance, car dealerships, fast food, real estate, education, petrol, government services and utility payments including telecom, earn Miles as per normal international spends.
Retail spends on merchants in the EU earn 50% of the international spends.
Express Miles

metadata.title: Skywards Signature Credit Card | Skywards Miles | Emirates NBD

content:
Retail spends on merchants in the EU earn 50% of the international spends.
Express Miles
Cardholders enrolled in the ‘50% more Express Miles every month programme’ are eligible to earn Express Miles. This is subject to a maximum of 4,000 additional Miles per statement. A nominal monthly fee of  250 is charged for the Express Miles programme. The listed annual fee of  1,500 is waived from the 2nd year onwards for cardholders enrolled into the Express Miles Programme. Bonus Miles for spends on Emirates website are excluded for Express Miles calculation.
Read the terms and conditions
Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage.
Key features
0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance
Up to  300,000 decease cover per cardholder
 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization
